data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Dong Jun Lee awards Daegu a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Jeong Seung-won for Daegu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Daegu.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seoul.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Daegu at World Cup Stadium.
In Seoul Daegu's Dejan Damjanovic is caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
In the minute 18, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Jeong Seung-won gets his shot on target but fails to score for Daegu.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Free kick Seoul.
In the minute 20, Daegu's Shin Chang-moo has been booked in Seoul.
Park Chu-young (Seoul) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seoul have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Daegu.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Daegu have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Seoul's Jung Han-min gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
Yoon Jong-gyu (Seoul) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Seoul throw-in in Daegu's half.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Seoul to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Dong Jun Lee blows against Daegu's Dejan Damjanovic for offside.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cesinha of Daegu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 43, Attention is being given to Daegu’s Tsubasa Nishi and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Tsubasa Nishi returns to the field for Daegu after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Daegu.
Throw-in for Daegu at World Cup Stadium.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
In the minute 45, Yoon Jong-gyu (Seoul) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seoul.
Free kick Seoul.
In the minute 52, Dong Jun Lee signals a Daegu throw-in in Seoul's half.
Daegu's Cesinha misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 54, Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Shin Chang-moo of Daegu is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Daegu.
Jung Han-min hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Seoul for Seoul.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 67, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Daegu's Jeong Tae-wook attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 67, Seoul have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lee Jin-hyun is replacing Ryu Jae-moon for Daegu at World Cup Stadium.
Kim Dae-won is replacing Tsubasa Nishi for the away team.
Kim Ho-young (Seoul) is making a first substitution, with Yun Ju-tae replacing Jung Han-min.
Dejan Damjanovic for Daegu is whistled offside.
In the minute 71, Dong Jun Lee awards Seoul a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Daegu in Seoul.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Daegu are pushing forward but Jeong Seung-won's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 75, Seoul have a goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
In the minute 77, Dong Jun Lee signals a Seoul throw-in in Daegu's half.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 82, In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Cesinha for Daegu drives towards goal at World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Daegu.
Free kick Seoul.
The home team have replaced Jo Yeong-uk with Lee Seung-jae. This is the second substitution made today by Kim Ho-young.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Seoul.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seoul.
Jo Jin-woo is on a sub for Dejan Damjanovic for Daegu.
In the minute 87, Seoul have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
In the minute 89, Free kick for Daegu in the half of Seoul.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Seoul.
Dong Jun Lee awards Daegu a goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
